bike.description: Stumpjumper FSR M5 Manipulated Alloy frame w/ ORE TT/DT for 29" wheel, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, DMD Direct Mount Der, replaceable derailleur hanger, disc only, 105mm travel

Shimano M660 SLX, DMD, top swing, dual pull
7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, 34.9mm clamp ID, black
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
